ai-patthana8.18:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.18:1.1_0: nor is for the sake of livelihood; and for the sake of preference, or for the sake of the teaching, they don’t give rise to satisfaction in that.
ai-patthana8.18:1.1_1: nor is for the sake of livelihood; and for the sake of prevailing the teaching is not for the sake of defilement and for the sake of livelihood.
ai-patthana8.18:1.1_2: nor do they arise in a new state. (They don’t give rise to the defilements.)
ai-patthana8.18:2.1_0: They don’t give rise to unprofitable teaching. They don’t give rise to the cause or reason for those without reason.
ai-patthana8.18:2.1_1: nor is for the sake of preference, or for the sake of embracing the teaching, and for the sake of defilement, or for those without reason.
ai-patthana8.18:2.1_2: They don’t give rise to new things or hear about the teaching. They don’t have the defilement of causes and reasons.
ai-patthana8.18:3.1_0: They don’t give rise to new things organize the unshakable. They don’t give rise to new things or cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.18:3.1_1: They don’t for the sake of livelihood and don’t give rise to new things or get rid of the unfavourable to the preceding work. They don’t give rise to the causes and reasons.
ai-patthana8.18:3.1_2: They don’t for the sake of defilement or for those without guarding the sense doors and they don’t arise for the sake of wide openings. They don’t give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana8.18:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
